title: Go Fly Drone Remote Controller
description:
Take your drone flying experience to new heights with Go Fly Controller Drone Remote, the advanced mobile app designed to make drone control smarter, safer, and more intuitive. Compatible with over 50 drone models, Go Fly Controller Drone Remote brings you the tools you need to explore the skies, capture stunning footage, and fly with confidence.

With an array of intelligent features and seamless compatibility, Go Fly Controller Drone Remote makes it easy for both beginners and experts to pilot drones with precision and ease.

** Compatible Devices:
- Matrice 200, 210, 200 V2, 210 V2 
- Matrice 210,  300, 350 RTK 
- Matrice 600 & Matrice 600 Pro, RTK and Ronin MX
- Matrice 100 with X3, X5 & X5R
- DJI Air2S, Mini2, Mini SE, X-Port, SkyPort, SkyPort V2, Smart Controller
- Mavic Air 2, Mini, 2 Enterprise, 2 Enterprise Dual, 2 Enterprise Advanced,  2 Pro, 2 Zoom, Pro, Air
- Phantom 4, 4 Pro, 4 Advanced, 4 Pro V2.0, P4 Multispectral, 4 RTK
- Phantom 3 Standard, Advanced, 4K & Professional
- Inspire 2, Inspire 1, Inspire 1 Pro & Inspire 1 RAW
- Spark

**Key Features:
Waypoint Flight Planning: Customize your drone’s flight path by setting waypoints for smooth, pre-planned routes. Ideal for professional aerial photography, surveying, and more.

Panorama and Spherical Capture: Create breathtaking 360° panoramic shots with a simple tap, delivering seamless horizontal and vertical panoramas.

Real-Time Weather Forecasting: Stay updated with UAV weather forecasts, including wind speed, temperature, and precipitation, ensuring safe and optimal flying conditions.

No-Fly Zone Alerts: Instantly receive alerts on restricted airspaces, helping you avoid no-fly zones such as airports and military areas.

Smart Flight Modes: Take advantage of intelligent flight modes for automated flight maneuvers. Perfect for capturing cinematic shots without needing advanced piloting skills.

Find My Drone: Track your drone’s GPS location if it’s lost, making recovery stress-free and safe.

Media Export and File Sharing: Easily export photos and videos in high-quality formats like MP4, JPG, and 4K resolution. Seamless sharing and editing capabilities.

Home Point Setting: Set a designated home point for a safe return if the battery is low or the connection is lost.

Gimbal and Exposure Controls: Fine-tune your drone’s gimbal and exposure settings directly from your phone for professional-quality photos and videos.

Flight Tutorials: New to flying? Access comprehensive tutorials for beginners and learn essential drone flying skills step-by-step.

Note: Fly Drone Remote Controller is not an official drone app; it supports drone models for Android phones.
We are constantly developing and upgrading our products, so your reviews are very valuable. Hope to receive your feedback or support through: support@digitalcarkeyllc.com

Terms of Service: https://digitalcarkeyllc.com/terms-of-service
Privacy: https://digitalcarkeyllc.com/privacy-policy
